aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.excellenceText: Limoz Rwanda Ltd is a car rental company with offices in the heart of Kigali. We are located in Kacyiru plot 20 Gasabo district, near the Police Headquarters. We are a transport service company featuring both a deluxe and economy fleet of vehicles with experienced professional drivers and committed management staff to help you with all your car hire needs. Limoz Rwanda Ltd is your convenient full-service transport company that provides excellent services 24 hours a day, 7 days a week with car hire services.
aboutPage.whyUsText: We own a variety of fleet with a blend of executive and middle class vehicles while ensuring that these hundreds of vehicles are serviced and well maintained on time and are in good condition. We pride ourselves with the safety of our passengers, as our cars are equipped with speed trackers to monitor driver patterns and vehicles are serviced and maintained on a regular basis. Our service quotes are fair and can be tailored to your specific needs (Self Drive, Chauffer Service, Airport Pick up/Drop offs, Weddings, and Leasing options). Punctuality and reliability are our top priorities in our service provision which leads to efficient service delivery. Professional and Experiences staff that includes drivers and protocol officers (ushers) who speak English, French and Kinyarwanda.
aboutPage.reliabilityText: At Limoz Rwanda Ltd you will realize that what matters to you equally matters to us. Reliability, Client Safety, Honesty, Comfort and Timelines is what we stand for. Our professional management staff provides you with the personalized service and attention to detail required for your special event. We promise to give more than just a luxury ride; that is our commitment.
aboutPage.serviceText: Limoz Rwanda Ltd provides the best quality transport service to the entire East African Community travelers. Our clientele includes government, non-government and private companies with services including hotel and airport pick-up and drops-off, corporate destination travel, weddings and other events.
aboutPage.fleetText: Our fleet of vehicles is equipped with GPS tracking systems that guarantee safety wherever you go. We pride ourselves in creating an experience in luxury ground transportation while giving our customers a comfortable and relaxed environment as you enjoy the serenity of our services.
aboutPage.cta: With us you rent a lot more than just a car!
